    • send

      java.util.Optional<LoraTransmission> send​(LoraWanPacket packet, java.util.Set<Receiver> receivers)
      Method to send a packet to a set of Receiver, according to the protocol specification
      Parameters:
      packet - the packet to send
      receivers - the set of receivers
      Returns:
      a copy of the transmission sent, if the packet is sent
